hero.title: Living Past the Romance of Activism, Part 1
hero.description: These are the stories of wives who shared their husbands with the country — and lost their spouses to the cause, either going missing or detained, or getting killed and declared as martyrs.

primary.title: Team PH savors best Olympic finish
primary.description: The ending was not picture-perfect but nothing can dim the luster of the gold medal won by gymnast Carlos Yulo and the bronze medals produced by boxers Nesthy Petecio and Aira Villegas.

secondary.title: Legacy secured: Grateful nation waiting for Carlos Yulo
secondary.description: Manila, Philippines — Another medal expressing the nation’s gratitude awaits celebrated Filipino gymnast Carlos Yulo, who made Philippine sports history by winning two gold medals in the 2024

secondary.title: Filipina golfers' late fightback caps off Olympics to remember for Philippines
secondary.description: Bianca Pagdanganan and Dottie Ardina were the Philippines’ final hopes for a medal in the quadrennial sports meet in Paris, aiming to sweeten a medal pot that contains two gold and two bronze medals.

secondary.title: Here's to the losers - Manila Standard
secondary.description: By Riera U. Mallari PARIS (Via PLDT Home) – Weightlifter John Ceniza waited for this moment all of his life. But a pinched nerve in his neck after the Philippine team’s training in Thailand last April has shattered his confidence and raised doubts on his dream.

carousel.title: PH inflation rises to 4.4% in July 2024
carousel.description: The Philippines’ overall inflation rate clocked in at 4.4 percent in July 2024 due to faster year-on-year increases in housing, water, electricity, gas and other fuels

carousel.title: 'Rappler is Filipino': CA voids 2018 Rappler shutdown, restores rights
carousel.description: (3rd UPDATE) The Duterte-time SEC 'displayed willful defiance,' says the Court of Appeals. 'These actions have no place in a democratic state.'

carousel.title: AFP says Chinese planes dropped flares in path of PAF patrol over Bajo de Masinloc
carousel.description: Saturday's incident brings to at least 14 the number of schools struck in Gaza since July 6, killing more than 280 according to an AFP tally of tolls previously given by officials in the territory.

carousel.title: Smartmatic executives charged in alleged bribery scheme in the Philippines
carousel.description: The voting technology company has been the target of conservative media and conspiracy theorists because of the spread of bogus fraud claims tied to the 2020 U.S. presidential election.
